newsitem.title: USA: Jayhawk Acceptance names new chairman/CEO.
newsitem.headline: Jayhawk Acceptance names new chairman/CEO.

text.p: Jayhawk Acceptance Corp said Monday that Carl Westcott has been elected chairman of the board and chief executive officer of the company.
In a statement released by the company, Westcott said, "I intend to devote my full time and attention to the company's continuing operations."
Also today, the company said it filed a voluntary petition for reorganization under Chapter 11.
A Jayhawk spokeswoman said former chairman and CEO Mike Smartt resigned from those positions, but will remain with the company for the time being.
